paragraphs.text: I’m learning to be a math teacher. That is only possible because my prior career didn’t work out, reducing my opportunity cost.

paragraphs.name: e0fa
paragraphs.text: If I were making big bucks, I couldn’t afford to stop for a couple of years and then get a low-paying job.

paragraphs.name: a500
paragraphs.text: Maybe I’m too literal, but my understanding of ‘qualified’ is being reasonably capable of completing a certain task. You are assumed to be ‘qualified’ when you carry a set of credentials (i.e., Bachelor’s degree in whatever), but we all know from experience this isn’t always the case. From my point of view, this is what we’re lied to about — that…
